settings.title: Settings
settings.configProfileDesc: Save different API configurations to quickly switch between providers and settings
settings.autoApproveDesc: The following settings allow Roo to automatically perform operations without requiring approval. Enable these settings only if you fully trust the AI and understand the associated security risks.
settings.alwaysApproveReadOnlyDesc: When enabled, Roo will automatically view directory contents and read files without requiring you to click the Approve button.
settings.alwaysApproveWriteDesc: Automatically create and edit files without requiring approval
settings.writeDelayDesc: Delay after writes to allow diagnostics to detect potential problems
settings.alwaysApproveBrowserDesc: Automatically perform browser actions without requiring approval
settings.alwaysApproveBrowserNote: Note: Only applies when the model supports computer use
settings.alwaysRetryFailedDesc: Automatically retry failed API requests when server returns an error response
settings.alwaysApproveMcpDesc: Enable auto-approval of individual MCP tools in the MCP Servers view (requires both this setting and the tool's individual "Always allow" checkbox)
settings.alwaysApproveMode: Always approve mode switching & task creation
settings.alwaysApproveModeDesc: Automatically switch between different AI modes and create new tasks without requiring approval
settings.alwaysApproveExecuteDesc: Automatically execute allowed terminal commands without requiring approval
settings.allowedCommandsDesc: Command prefixes that can be auto-executed when "Always approve execute operations" is enabled.
settings.viewportSizeDesc: Select the viewport size for browser interactions. This affects how websites are displayed and interacted with.

welcome.title: What can Roo do for you?
welcome.description: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.

prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.preferred_language_description: Select the language that Cline should use for communication.
prompts.custom_description: These instructions apply to all modes. They provide a base set of behaviors that can be enhanced by mode-specific instructions below.
prompts.instructions_pre: Instructions can also be loaded from

model_specific.title: Mode-Specific Prompts
model_specific.description: Hit the + to create a new custom mode, or just ask Roo in chat to create one for you!
model_specific.role_definition_description: Define Roo's expertise and personality for this mode. This description shapes how Roo presents itself and approaches tasks.
model_specific.api_description: Select which API configuration to use for this mode
model_specific.tools_description: Tools for built-in modes cannot be modified

provider.keyPrivacy: This key is stored locally and only used to make API requests from this extension.
